author: BBC News
title: Yemen: Two women freed in US-Saudi special op
description: They had been captive since going to visit relatives in the capital, Sanaa, a Saudi official said.
content:
Image source, Getty Images
Image caption, The women had their passports confiscated and forced into marriages, reports say
